scripts.postinstall: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:db && pnpm build:ui
scripts.dev: VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:5001/v1 pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:db && pnpm build:ui && pnpm --filter @rapid/api buildOpenapi && tsx scripts/checkSmtpPort.ts && concurrently -n api,client,website,smtp -c blue,magenta,cyan,green "pnpm --filter @rapid/api dev" "pnpm --filter @rapid/client dev" "pnpm --filter @rapid/website dev" "pnpm --filter @rapid/smtp-listener dev"
scripts.dev:api: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:db && pnpm --filter @rapid/api dev
scripts.dev:client: VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:5001/v1 pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:db && pnpm build:ui && pnpm --filter @rapid/client dev
scripts.devWebsite: pnpm build:ui && pnpm --filter @rapid/api buildOpenapi && pnpm --filter @rapid/website dev
